dataConfig.document: <entity name="music-stamm-exasol-reduced" datasource="exasol" pk="stamm_eancid" query=" with master as ( select stamm_match_code as master_matchcode, max(stamm_vdatum) as master_vdatum from stamm_gesamt where stamm_mainprod_header = 1 group by stamm_match_code order by stamm_match_code ), bewegung_90 as ( select bwg_eancid, sum(bwg_wert) as bwg_wert, max(zeit_wert_t.modification_date) as modification_date, SUM( CASE BWG_CONT_DIST WHEN 646 THEN BWG_MENGE / 100 WHEN 647 THEN 0 ELSE BWG_WERT / CASE WHEN STAMM_AG_CODE IN (1, 6, 12, 15, 64, 71, 73, 74, 101, 104) THEN 2.30 WHEN STAMM_AG_CODE IN (2, 3, 7, 29, 32, 41, 42, 44, 107 ) THEN 4.20 ELSE 1 END END ) as track_value from bewegung_t, zeit_wert_t, stamm_gesamt where bwg_zeitkey = zeit_key and bwg_landid = land_id and bwg_appid = app_id and stamm_eancid = bwg_eancid and stamm_landid = bwg_landid and bwg_landid = 1054 and stamm_landid = 1054 and start_date >= now() - 90 group by bwg_eancid union all select bwg_eancid, sum(bwg_wert) as bwg_wert, max(zeit_wert_w.modification_date) as modification_date, SUM( CASE BWG_CONT_DIST WHEN 646 THEN BWG_MENGE / 100 WHEN 647 THEN 0 ELSE BWG_WERT / CASE WHEN STAMM_AG_CODE IN (1, 6, 12, 15, 64, 71, 73, 74, 101, 104) THEN 2.30 WHEN STAMM_AG_CODE IN (2, 3, 7, 29, 32, 41, 42, 44, 107 ) THEN 4.20 ELSE 1 END END ) as track_value from bewegung_w, zeit_wert_w, stamm_gesamt where bwg_zeitkey = zeit_key and bwg_landid = land_id and bwg_appid = app_id and stamm_eancid = bwg_eancid and stamm_landid = bwg_landid and bwg_landid in (1013, 1041) and stamm_landid in (1013, 1041) and start_date >= now() - 90 group by bwg_eancid ), product_sales as ( select stamm_match_code as sales_product, sum(bwg_wert) as sales_wert, sum(track_value) as track_value, max(bewegung_90.modification_date) as mod_date from bewegung_90, stamm_gesamt where stamm_eancid = bwg_eancid and stamm_match_code > 0 and stamm_landid in (1054, 1041, 1013) group by stamm_match_code ) SELECT stamm_match_code, stamm_gesamt.modification_date, round(nvl(sales_wert, 0), 0) AS SALES_MENGE, round(nvl(track_value, 0), 0) AS TRACK_VALUE, STAMM_TITEL AS TITLE, trim(concat(STAMM_TITEL, ' ', STAMM_TITEL2)) AS TITLE_WITH_VERSION, trim(CONVERT_TO_FULLTEXT(STAMM_TITEL2)) AS TITLE2, STAMM_ARTIST AS ARTIST, STAMM_LANDID AS LAND_ID, LAND.LAND_ASID AS LAND_TXT, STAMM_EANCID AS EANCID, STAMM_EANC AS EANC, STAMM_AGID AS FORMAT_ID, STAMM_AG_TXT AS FORMAT_TXT, STAMM_WG_CODE AS GENRE_CODE, STAMM_WG_TXT AS GENRE_TXT, STAMM_LABEL_TXT AS LABEL_TXT, STAMM_FIRM_CODE AS HERST_CODE, STAMM_HERST_TXT AS HERST_TXT, CONCAT('F_', STAMM_MATCH_CODE) AS MATCH_CODE, CONCAT('P_', STAMM_PRODNR) AS PROD_NR, STAMM_MUSIKFREMD AS MUSIKFREMD, STAMM_PROMO AS PROMO, STAMM_VDATUM AS RELEASE_DATE, STAMM_MAINPROD_HEADER AS MAINPROD_HEADER, STAMM_IS_HEADER AS PROD_HEADER, STAMM_AG_MAIN_FORMAT AS AG_MAIN_FORMAT, STAMM_AG_AUDIO_VIDEO AS AG_AUDIO_VIDEO, STAMM_COMP AS COMP, STAMM_GESAMT.MODIFICATION_DATE as MODIFICATION_DATE, CONCAT(to_char(STAMM_LANDID), to_char(STAMM_EANCID)) AS UID, MASTER_VDATUM as MASTER_VDATUM, ARTIST_ID, sm_master_artist_link.MODIFICATION_DATE as AI_MODDATE, case when ( stamm_landid = 1054 and stamm_ag_audio_video = 'A' and stamm_ag_main_format = 'L' and length(stamm_match_code) < 12 and stamm_comp = '1' and stamm_wg_header_code in (10100, 10200) and stamm_wg_code not in (10112, 10124) ) then 'Compilation' when ( stamm_landid <> 1054 and stamm_ag_audio_video = 'A' and stamm_ag_main_format = 'L' and stamm_comp = '1' ) then 'Compilation' when ( stamm_landid = '1054' and stamm_ag_main_format = 'L' ) then 'Album' when ( stamm_landid = '1108' and stamm_ag_main_format = 'L' and stamm_ag_audio_video = 'A' ) then 'Album' when ( stamm_landid <> '1054' and stamm_landid <> '1108' and stamm_ag_main_format = 'L' and stamm_ag_audio_video = 'A' and stamm_comp <> '1' ) then 'Album' when ( stamm_ag_audio_video = 'A' and stamm_ag_main_format = 'L' ) then 'Album' when ( stamm_landid = 1054 and stamm_ag_main_format = 'S' and stamm_ag_audio_video in ('A', 'V') and stamm_wg_header_code in (10100, 10200) and stamm_wg_code not in (10112, 10124) ) then 'Single' when ( stamm_landid <> 1054 and stamm_ag_main_format = 'S' and stamm_ag_audio_video in ('A', 'V') ) then 'Single' when ( stamm_landid = 1054 and stamm_ag_audio_video = 'V' and length(stamm_gesamt.stamm_match_code) < 12 and stamm_wg_header_code in (10100, 10200) and stamm_wg_code not in (10112, 10124) ) then 'DVD' when ( stamm_landid <> 1054 and stamm_ag_audio_video = 'V' ) then 'DVD' when ( stamm_landid = 1054 and stamm_ag_main_format = 'L' and stamm_ag_audio_video in ('A', 'V') and length(stamm_gesamt.stamm_match_code) < 12 and stamm_comp <> '1' and stamm_wg_header_code in (10100, 10200) and stamm_wg_code not in (10112, 10124) ) then 'Album' when ( stamm_landid <> 1054 and stamm_ag_main_format = 'L' and stamm_ag_audio_video in ('A', 'V') ) then 'Album' end as criteria FROM STAMM_GESAMT, LAND, product_sales, master, sm_master_artist_link WHERE STAMM_LANDID = LAND_ID AND STAMM_APPID = 12 AND NVL(STAMM_QUELLE, 'EMPTY') <> 'MA' AND stamm_match_code = sales_product(+) and stamm_match_code = master_matchcode(+) and stamm_eancid = item_type(+) || TO_CHAR(item_id(+)) and STAMM_EANC NOT LIKE 'XX_%' AND ( '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR STAMM_GESAMT.MODIFICATION_DATE > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' OR sm_master_artist_link.MODIFICATION_DATE > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' OR mod_date > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' ) " >
